### 3. usage.rst ```rst Usage Instructions ==================

Once you have installed the Comet Chat App, you can start using it by following these steps:

  1. Creating an Account: - Navigate to the registration page and fill out the required fields.

  2. Logging In: - Use your credentials to log in.

  3. Using Chat Features: - Access the chat interface to send messages, initiate audio or video calls, and manage your chat settings.

  4. Managing Conversations: - You can view your chat history and delete conversations as needed.

Refer to the user interface for specific functionalities.

comet-chat-app
